short.am,ar,bg,ca,da,de,el,es,es_419,fi,fr,hi,: Take screenshots and record the screen of YouTube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Screenshot Chrome Extension
---------------------------------------------------------------
This Chrome extension allows you to capture screenshots while watching YouTube videos. With its user-friendly interface, you can quickly take a screenshot by using the shortcut button integrated into the video control bar. Here are the main features it offers:

Take Screenshots from YouTube
----------------------------------------------------
Easily capture screenshots at any moment during the video. The screenshot is saved in a folder named after the video, making it easy to manage hundreds of screenshots. The screenshot is saved with the page title and downloaded to your computer in the format you choose.

Add Shortcut to YouTube Video Bar: A shortcut button integrated into the YouTube video player control bar allows you to take a screenshot with a single click while watching the video.

This extension is perfect for content creators or anyone who wants more control over their YouTube experience. By enabling easy screenshot capabilities, it provides both a practical and professional experience.

Disclaimer
-----------------
This extension allows you to take screenshots while watching YouTube videos. However, downloading videos or reproducing them without permission is prohibited according to YouTube's terms of service. This extension does not provide a direct video downloading feature but enables screen capture. Users are fully responsible for the use of the screenshots made on YouTube or other platforms. The developer cannot be held liable for any legal consequences or copyright violations arising from the misuse of this extension against YouTube policies.
